issue.title: [CF 746] Complete logical operators and logic editor
issue.body:
The logical operator "not" is missing.
Moreover, a more user-friendly logic editing style may be good.
Each one or set of conditions can be represented by logical variables in the editor. And the editor may have powerful logic support.
Then it will be more flexible.           Sorry for my broken English


> Posted by CurseForge user magistw | Imported from CurseForge issue #746 | Raw

comments.body:
No it isn't.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
